title: Drawing, "Drawing.  Study.  The Chimborazo and neighboring mountains, shown from "near Guanoco", Ecuador.", June 13, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on grayish paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed with numbers, at various locations; again at upper right:  2 warm transparent light / 3 Blue grey / 4 Buish purple with warm light / 5 Blackish with a tinge of greenish / brown especially the lights / 6 Snow thinly deposited over the paramo/ near Guanojo June 13th / 57; and again, at center: green
description: Horizontal view of Mount Chimborazo and neighboring mountains with the roofs of two houses and a plateau visible in the foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  Study.  The Chimborazo and neighboring mountains, shown from "near Guanoco", Ecuador.", June 13, 1857.
June 13, 1857. Graphite, brush and white gouache on grayish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-232.
